channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold Prices Expected to Continue Rising in 2025
item.description: Spot gold held solid gains and Axis Securities said prices are expected to continue to rise in 2025 even though they’re in an overbought territory, as...

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper Strikes $1 Billion Deal for Energy Drink Maker Ghost
item.description: The energy-drink market includes bigger rivals Monster Beverage and Celsius.

item.title: Sterling Trims Gains After U.K. PMI Data Miss Forecasts
item.description: Sterling trimmed its gains after provisional U.K. PMI data for October missed expectations, with S&P saying cost pressures were easing, and the BOE co...

item.title: Oil Rebounds on Middle East Risks
item.description: Oil prices rebounded following the previous session’s selloff, but further gains will likely be capped by weak demand in China and prospects of a glob...

item.title: Coca-Cola CEO says McDonald's E. coli outbreak won't hurt beverage company's sales
item.description: Coca-Cola CEO James Quincey said an E. coli outbreak linked to McDonald's isn't likely to hurt the beverage company's sales at this stage.

item.title: IBM stock slips on disappointing consulting and infrastructure revenue
item.description: IBM's critical software category performed well due to Red Hat's gains, but the consulting and infrastructure segments pulled down overall results.

item.title: Barclays shares hit nine-year high after third quarter profit jumps 23%, beating expectations
item.description: British bank Barclays on Thursday reported £1.6 billion ($2 billion) net profit attributable to shareholders for the third quarter, beating expectatio...

item.title: Vicious Partner Feud Roils EF Hutton
item.description: The investment bank that revived a storied brand made millions taking startups like Donald Trump’s social-media platform public. Now it’s beset by fig...

item.title: Tesla shares jump on profit beat, Musk's prediction of at least 20% 'vehicle growth' next year
item.description: Tesla reported better-than-expected profit in its third-quarter earnings report on Wednesday.

item.title: New Boeing CEO sets sights on 'leaner' future as quarterly loss tops $6 billion
item.description: Boeing had released preliminary results earlier this month showing a big loss and $5 billion in charges across its defense and commercial units.
